data.eml:eml: Drepanosticta machadoi spec. nov. from New Guinea (Odonata: Platystictidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Theischinger, G., Richards, S. J. (2014): Drepanosticta machadoi spec. nov. from New Guinea (Odonata: Platystictidae). Zootaxa 3866 (1): 145-150, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3866.1.9
